title: ISUZU UTE A League Men match Melbourne Victory v Western Sydney Wanderers: Saturday 15 October 2022
articleContent:
ISUZU UTE A League Men match Melbourne Victory v Western Sydney Wanderers: Saturday 15 October 2022

Soccer is back in Melbourne! Public transport is your best way to enjoy it, as Melbourne Victory take battle with the Western Sydney Wanderers. Extra services will help you get to and from the AAMI Park on Saturday 15 October 2022.

The event will begin at 7.45pm.

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki so that we can contact you if you have been exposed to coronavirus (COVID-19) on a public transport service. Register your myki now - it's quick and easy.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station

  • Belgrave – leaving at 10:01pm from platform 10
  • Glen Waverly – leaving at 9:55pm from Platform 10
  • Frankston – leaving at 9:55pm from Platform 4
  • Pakenham – leaving at 9:55pm from Platform 6
  • Sandringham - leaving at 9:54pm from Platform 2

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70a

  • Trams will operate as a shuttle service with 8 additional trams Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Passengers can catch the following buses close to AAMI Park:

  • Route 246

Services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.
articleDescription: ISUZU UTE A League Men match Melbourne Victory v Western Sydney Wanderers
